page.title: 18EMPLOYERS
page.content: Pwllheli is the shopping centre for the Llyn Peninsula in the shops.We have Supermarkets such as Kwik Save, Co-op,Pricerite and Spar. 14 shops are owned by large companies. At present 7 shops are empty and in one there is a closing down sale. { The district council offices(Cyngor {Dwyfor) are situated on the Embankment Ceka Tools is a large emloyer which packs the tools produced in Germany for export.Two other important employers are Eifionydd Farmers Assoc. an agricultural supplier and Jewson,a builder's merchant. { On the Glan y Don Industrial Estate {we find a Footwear Factory,Janitorial {Supplies,Window Manufacturers,Paint {Distributors,a Coal Merchant and {Engineering Works. Plans of a lagre store to be built by the BR Station are being studied.
